title: Tempting the Dryad
description: *2017 RONE Finalist ~ Best Paranormal/Urban Fantasy*His dark Gift threatens everything he loves...Rock Run warrior Tiago do Rio is hiding a dark Gift, one so powerful and easily misused it could make him a pariah in his own clan. Worse, he lusts after the beautiful sun fae queen—his own brother's mate. The temptation to use his Gift to make his darkest fantasies come true is almost irresistible. The only good thing in his life is his friendship with the dryad Alesia.Wild, solitary fae Alesia lives on an uninhabited island in Rock Run territory. Her Gift is to make things grow. She spends her days tending to her woodland home, but her nights are lonely—until she meets the sexy Latino shifter. Now she and Tiago are best friends, but she longs for more.A clan’s fate at stake...Then just as the two realize they may be mates, a den of rogue shifters threatens to bring war down on the Rock Run clan—and Tiago and Alesia are caught in the middle. Can Tiago master his terrifying Gift in time? Or will he lose his mate as well as his soul?
author: Rebecca Rivard
